typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Gender as string,
		HR_Salary as long,
		IT_Salary as long,
		Training_Salary as long
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> PivotEmp
PivotEmp unpivot(output(
		Department as long,
		Salary as long
	),
	ungroupBy(Gender),
	lateral: true,
	ignoreNullPivots: false) ~> Unpivot
Unpivot derive(Department = dropRight(Department, 7)) ~> DerivedColumn1
